{{flavour|A terrible three-pronged weapon, moulded by fire and brimstone.}}

{{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the '[[Polearms]]' category. It is a one-handed weapon.}}

'''Demon tridents''' are the best one handed [[polearms]], dealing significantly more damage than regular [[trident]]s. Though a demon trident is slightly weaker than a [[demon blade]] or [[demon whip]], their [[reaching]] ability helps make them more desirable.

Worshippers of [[good]] [[god]]s cannot attack with them without suffering [[penance]]. However, worshippers of [[the Shining One]] can convert a demon trident into a [[trishula]], with better stats and the [[holy wrath]] brand. You can reverse the process with [[Kikubaaqudgha]]'s or [[Lugonu]]'s blessing.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.14]], demon tridents dealt slightly more damage than normal in the hands of [[demonspawn]] characters.
*Prior to [[0.10]], demon tridents did 13 damage, but lacked innate [[reaching]].
